titleStmt.title: Christ in the clouds, or, God's coming to judgment A short treatise, very necessary in these evil and dangerous times, for all those which desire that the day of the Lord may be their day of joy.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Clark, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger,

notesStmt.note: Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1905 as Wing (2nd ed.) C3931A.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
